DOC.brief_summary: This clinical study perform subject age 12-60 year old enrol NCT01310374 receive 2010 seasonal influenza vaccine evaluate persistence immune response influenza vaccine 24 month vaccination .
DOC.brief_title: Persistence Immune Response After Vaccination With Influenza Vaccine
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects previously vaccinate 12 60 year age 2010 seasonal influenza vaccine.The persistence phase start 24 month primary vaccination blood sample take 6 , 12 , 18 24 month primary vaccination . Subjects whose antibody titer le 1:40 6 month primary vaccination receive booster dose influenza vaccine .
